Name: pearl-nightingale-85
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: lemon-tuna-1492
Comments.Text: Another impressive display of kitchen disaster skills—maybe stick to takeout before you burn down the house.

Comments.Name: dancing-giraffe-4850
Comments.Text: Maybe next time try cooking outside or just order pizza—less risk of setting off the alarm.
